entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 03:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -32.4°C
Pressure: 103.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -35.5°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
